describe: Identifier of function expression shall consist of word characters and only traling digits allowed.
Function name shall consist of word characters and only traling digits allowed.
Name of property with function expression shall consist of word characters and only traling digits allowed.
Function name can be of PascalCase (when it is a constructor)
Identifier of function expression can be of PascalCase (when it is a constructor)
Name of property with function expression can be of PascalCase (when it is a constructor)
